TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool DialogProc(IntPtr hwndDlg, int uMsg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);
.class public auto ansi sealed DialogProc extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function DialogProc(hwndDlg As IntPtr, uMsg As Integer, wParam As IntPtr, lParam As IntPtr) As Boolean
public delegate bool DialogProc(IntPtr hwndDlg, int uMsg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);
type DialogProc = delegate of nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> bool

span.span: A handle to the dialog box.

summary.span: Przetwarza wiadomości, które są wysyłane do modalne lub niemodalne okno dialogowe.

span.span: Processes messages that are sent to a modal or modeless dialog box.

returns.span: Jeśli DialogProc pomyślnie przetworzył message; w przeciwnym razie .

span.span: if the DialogProc successfully processed the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat programowania, korzystając z funkcji DialogProc i konsoli Microsoft Management Console (MMC), zobacz [Podręcznik programisty programu MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the DialogProc function and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
